mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ESSAY(EMAIL, FIELD, LANG, ETITLE, ECONTENT) VALUES(#{email}, #{field},#{lang}, #{etitle}, #{econtent})
mapper.select: SELECT e.eno, e.email, e.field, e.lang, e.etitle, e.econtent, e.likecnt, e.regdate, m.mname, m.PHOTO FROM essay E JOIN member m ON e.email = m.email WHERE e.eno = #{eno}
